mapper.sql: id , title , description , content , view_cnt , delete_yn , created_date , modified_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title,description,content,view_cnt, delete_yn, created_date,modified_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{content}, 0, 0, NOW(), NULL)
mapper.delete: UPDATE post SET delete_yn = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM post WHERE delete_yn = 0 ORDER BY id DESC
